glosses: Great Britain (a large island (sometimes also including some of the surrounding smaller islands) off the north-west coast of Western Europe, made up of England, Scotland, and Wales)
Great Britain (the United Kingdom, a kingdom and country in Northern Europe including the island of Great Britain as well as Northern Ireland on the northeastern portion of the island of Ireland)
synonyms: Büyük Britanya ve Kuzey İrlanda Birleşik Krallığı

etymology: From büyük (“great, big”) + Britanya (“Britain”). Compare Azerbaijani Böyük Britaniya, Bashkir Бөйөк Брита́ния (Böyök Britániya), Uzbek Buyuk Britaniya, Turkmen Beýik Britaniýa, etc.
